comment: All you have to do is your papers, which are easy to do and participate in the class, which I took online, and you will do well.  I highly recommend this professor.

Easiest class I have ever taken. Got a 99.5 for the class. 2 discussion posts every week. 1 paper a month, normally 2 pages. A midterm & a final. Both tests are 9 questions, with your opinion on ethical dilemmas. If you don't take him, you've got to be stupid. I took him online btw.

I took his online class. It seems to be alot of work, but it's not really.  If you do the work (4 papers) and participate, you should make an A.  Very nice Professor.  I would definitely recommend him!
Enjoyed his class and think he is a great teacher.
Best teacher ever! Such a nice guy!! Paper due every month which if you just do them, you get a 100% ! Tests are so easy!! He is the nicest teacher at KSU.. take him if you can!!! Easy A+ !!!
